resources:
Ford Status Widget FordPass Alert FordPass Log-in Manage Profiles OTA Update Info Choose Linked Apps Refresh Save Settings Restore Settings Save Logfile View Fast Charge Logs Check For Update Manage Vehicles Set Vehicle Color Set Charging Reminder Update Information Settings Display status info for Ford vehicles Set a reminder time to plug in if the vehicle\'s charge is below a given threshold. Click on a profile to log in with that VIN. Click on an unused entry to create a login for a new vehicle. Click on the "X" to delete a profile. Select which vehicles should be visible within the widget. Click on the \"+\" icon to add a new vehicle. It a vehicle model is "Unknown", click on the text to select it from a list (this info is used to display the correct image on the widget). If your model is not listed, enable logging to capture data and create an issue on GitHub (https://github.com/khpylon/MachEWidget). "Your vehicle's VIN" Time between widget updates Units to display Enable lock and start commands on widget double-tap Enable app launcher buttons Allow any app to be linked to \"charger\" widget Use transparent background Show time of last refresh instead of elapsed time Display location on widget Save log-in credentials Use stored credentials Enable logging Store logging info in a local file, separate from system logs GitHub repo Link to the code repository Battery optimization Enable battery optimization notification Automatic forced updates If vehicle data is more than 6 hours old, automatically force an update. WARNING: This may cause a drain on the 12V battery. Enable forced refresh Allow user-forced updates from the widget. WARNING: This may cause a drain on the 12V battery. Enable color display of vehicle Display vehicle photo instead of logo on full-size widget Do not update while Do Not Disturb is active Hibernate app Don\'t pull data until public API is released Display charge session info When charging, display charge rate and energy added Display DCFC info When DC fast charging, request updates every 30 seconds Save DCFC logs Save fast charging info so it can be viewed in the app (Display DCFC info must also be enabled). They are not stored in the app. "com.ford.fordpass" ColorActivity Next Previous The VIN must be 17 characters long.
